items.sentence: How did Tom know he was supposed to be here today?
I asked Tom if he knew anyone who taught swimming.
I asked Tom to lend me some money, but he refused.
You don\'t have to tell Tom twice to do something.
When did you start going out with your girlfriend?
Where are you going to spend your summer vacation?
Tom must be aware that Mary is John\'s girlfriend.
I\'ve changed. I\'m not the same man I used to be.
I wish you\'d consider coming back to work for us.
Tom didn\'t anticipate that it would be a problem.
Tom didn\'t feel well, but he went to work anyway.
Tom didn\'t give the police officer his real name.
Tom didn\'t have a bicycle when he was growing up.
When the last customer leaves, we close the doors.
When was the last time you went to an art gallery?
Why do so many people suffer from low self-esteem?
There are none so blind as those who will not see.
There is indisputable proof that Tom is the thief.
This is a lot more fun than I thought it would be.
This is probably not a good time to be doing this.
It took Tom a lot of time to find a parking space.
It took quite a while to sort out all our luggage.
The police detective didn\'t believe Tom\'s story.
The police found Tom\'s footprint in Mary\'s room.
Tom was glad that Mary was home with the children.
Tom was in the hospital for a few weeks last year.
Tom was kind enough to lend me the money I needed.
You still have a lot to learn about relationships.
I didn\'t know you were planning to leave at 2:30.
I didn\'t see Tom again till I got back to Boston.
I didn\'t think I was going to get along with Tom.
I didn\'t think I was going to like you this much.
A barber is a man who shaves and cuts men\'s hair.
I didn\'t know what I\'d done was against the law.
I didn\'t know you didn\'t live in Boston anymore.
Tom usually only wears glasses when he\'s reading.
I asked Tom not to post my picture on his website.
Tom couldn\'t have done that without Mary\'s help.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d heard her name.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d last seen Mary.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d parked his car.
We believe it was possible that Tom poisoned Mary.
I know you probably wanted to do that by yourself.
I need to understand the meaning of this sentence.
I never expected to meet her in a place like this.
I just have a gut feeling Tom is hiding something.
I like tall, beautiful women with long black hair.
Tom should\'ve kissed Mary when he had the chance.
I don\'t want to tell Tom I\'ve been to Australia.
Do you think Tom would be willing to dance for us?
